instructions: Image titled Reset a Nokia Lumia 520 Step 1 1 Slide your screen to the left from the Start screen of your Nokia Lumia 520. Image titled Reset a Nokia Lumia 520 Step 2 2 Scroll to and tap on Settings. Image titled Reset a Nokia Lumia 520 Step 3 3 Scroll to and tap on about. Image titled Reset a Nokia Lumia 520 Step 4 4 Tap on reset your phone. Image titled Reset a Nokia Lumia 520 Step 5 5 Tap on yes when asked to confirm that you want to reset your phone. Image titled Reset a Nokia Lumia 520 Step 6 6 Tap on yes again to initiate the reset process. Your Nokia device will take several minutes to reset, restore its original factory settings, and reboot.
